# The `ThinLTOCodeGenerator` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class define an interface similar to the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ltocodegenerator">LTOCodeGenerator</a>, but adapted for ThinLTO processing. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::ThinLTOCodeGenerator</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class define an interface similar to the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ltocodegenerator">LTOCodeGenerator</a>, but adapted for ThinLTO processing.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thinltocodegenerator">ThinLTOCodeGenerator</a> is not intended to be reuse for multiple compilation: the model is that the client adds modules to the generator and ask to perform the ThinLTO optimizations / codegen, and finally destroys the codegenerator.

Definition at line 59 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

  prototype={<>void ThinLTOCodeGenerator::addModule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Identifier, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Data)</>}>
Add given module to the code generator.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/thinltocodegenerator-cpp/#l00543">543</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/thinltocodegenerator-cpp">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### crossReferenceSymbol() {#a8fc86965bafc089b4e28d6bc3c9b71ab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ThinLTOCodeGenerator::crossReferenceSymbol (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name)</>}>
Adds to a list of all global symbols that are cross-referenced between ThinLTO files.

If the ThinLTO CodeGenerator can ensure that every references from a ThinLTO module to this symbol is optimized away, then the symbol can be discarded.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/thinltocodegenerator-cpp/#l00570">570</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/thinltocodegenerator-cpp">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getProducedBinaries() {#a73f6c6916269fbca6fd4a36fa8435af4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; MemoryBuffer &gt; &gt; &amp; llvm::ThinLTOCodeGenerator::getProducedBinaries ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the &quot;in memory&quot; binaries produced by the code generator.

This is filled after <a href="#a8f109c8e5687e9ee05ee86648c229398">run()</a> unless <a href="/docs/api/groups/options/#ga206c4e86f664ea1d9690f55146d7c437">setGeneratedObjectsDirectory()</a> has been called, in which case results are available through <a href="#ab7aef709e1748908f580b2a8427c5a0f">getProducedBinaryFiles()</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h/#l00094">94</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getProducedBinaryFiles() {#ab7aef709e1748908f580b2a8427c5a0f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt; std::string &gt; &amp; llvm::ThinLTOCodeGenerator::getProducedBinaryFiles ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the &quot;on-disk&quot; binaries produced by the code generator.

This is filled after <a href="#a8f109c8e5687e9ee05ee86648c229398">run()</a> when <a href="/docs/api/groups/options/#ga206c4e86f664ea1d9690f55146d7c437">setGeneratedObjectsDirectory()</a> has been called, in which case results are available through <a href="#a73f6c6916269fbca6fd4a36fa8435af4">getProducedBinaries()</a>.

### preserveSymbol() {#a0d863527fbd7b2fe4ca8dc51d6c8d525}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ThinLTOCodeGenerator::preserveSymbol (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name)</>}>
Adds to a list of all global symbols that must exist in the final generated code.

If a symbol is not listed there, it will be optimized away if it is inlined into every usage.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/thinltocodegenerator-cpp/#l00566">566</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/thinltocodegenerator-cpp">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### run() {#a8f109c8e5687e9ee05ee86648c229398}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void ThinLTOCodeGenerator::run ()">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> all the modules that were added to the code generator in parallel.

Client can access the resulting object files using <a href="#a73f6c6916269fbca6fd4a36fa8435af4">getProducedBinaries()</a>, unless <a href="/docs/api/groups/options/#ga206c4e86f664ea1d9690f55146d7c437">setGeneratedObjectsDirectory()</a> has been called, in which case results are available through <a href="#ab7aef709e1748908f580b2a8427c5a0f">getProducedBinaryFiles()</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h/#l00086">86</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/thinltocodegenerator-cpp/#l00959">959</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/lto/thinltocodegenerator-cpp">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
